subject: Vam pro problem
description_text:
I have the simsonn pro x ultra pedals and I bought the vam pro(Order
#SSN1915) and(Order #SSN2268). I have all software and hardware up to date.
They work, but after 5 or 10 minutes it stops working. They block with full
vibration and it only stops when I shut down the computer and turn
electricity of the pedals. After restarting everything it works again for
another 5 or 10 minutes and block again in full vibration. Need help!

conversations.body_text: Hi Nuno Costa,  If this happens, it indicates that the computerâ€™s grounding is not reliable, possibly because a three-prong plug was not used with a three-prong wall outlet. You can refer to the post below: connect the computer case to the stand, and connect the control box to the metal screws on the pedals. This should resolve the disconnection issue.  https://github.com/SHWotever/SimHub/wiki/USB-Issues-Troubleshooting https://support.gomezsimindustries.com/portal/en/kb/articles/understanding-emi-and-grounding
